'''Rosanella''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Local bartender, Rosanella doubles as an amateur alchemist creating various foul concoctions to help people deal with... problems.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Alcohol
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  = 
|quests_involved = [Iron Gut](/ironGut/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Iron Gut](/ironGut/): She gives you the recipe that will help [Pietro](/pietro/).
